title: E-Commerce Analytics
description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization. Features dark mode, customizable widgets, and inventory predictions.

title: AI Content Generator
description: An AI-powered content creation suite leveraging the Gemini API. Generates marketing copy, code snippets, and images in seconds.

title: Cloud Task Manager
description: A collaborative workspace for remote teams. Features real-time updates via WebSockets, drag-and-drop kanban boards, and team roles.
